text:
Ekta Kapoor (born 7 June 1975) is an Indian Film/TV Producer and Director.
She has produced shows like, Kasamh Se, Jodha Akbar, Kundali Bhagya for Zee TV and Naagin 3, Kasam Tere Pyaar Ki for Colors TV, Qayamat Ki Raat and Kasautii Zindagii Kay 2 for Star Plus.
Early life and education.
Ekta Kapoor is the daughter of actors Jeetendra and Shobha Kapoor. Her younger brother Tusshar Kapoor is also a Bollywood actor.
She went to school at Bombay Scottish School, Mahim and attended college at Mithibai College.
